website_summaries.verdict: Offers a lot of protection without too much bulk and is less expensive than some other similar cases.
pros: Includes a hard shell and a flexible outer case for extra protection
Offers excellent protection while still being reasonably lightweight and thin
cons: Can be hard to put on initially and some reported issues with the screen protector not fitting correctly

customer_reviews.title: Cracked corners, bought another one.
customer_reviews.text: This case has held up for 17 months of use in a clinic waiting room as a kiosk for patients to update digital forms. It has held up well and survived the hands of many users. However, the case has cracked on all four corners, the bottom corners of the case being worse than the top corners of the case. Honestly, the case feels well built and I thought the life expectancy would have been a longer than this. For the price, maybe this is what I should expect. You'll probably think I am crazy but I have just ordered another one. Maybe the second one will last longer than the first one. I'll let everyone know.
customer_reviews.author: Stiff_stanchions

customer_reviews.title: Make Sure It's For The Model You Have
customer_reviews.text: Update: There isn't anything wrong with this product if it's meant for the model you have. This product did not fit my iPad. However many people have purchase this after watching my Youtube video because it fits their iPad. I forgot to update this review. I wanted to make it clear. The seller mistakingly listed in the description that it would fit my iPad. That has been ratified and wanted to make sure I explained it clearly. This is the only reason for the 3 stars because it wasn't meant for my iPad.
customer_reviews.author: fotoladysince9

customer_reviews.title: I was surprised and impressed  by the quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is for my grand daughter so I wanted something durable yet easy to use. The reviews were good so I gave this a try. I was very impressed the fit, finish, and overall quality. It’s a great value at any price range. I did add a glass screen protector that fit under the screen protector that was part of the case. You can see a small bubble at one corner. The tolerance is close and I was probably a little off center. The pressure from the case caused the glass screen protector to raise slightly. It is not that noticeable when using the iPad and adds more protection so it was worth it. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ChipN

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: got this for my iPad. it is a little bit difficult to fit it in. have to be careful and take your time. at first I thought it was a wrong order. but afterwards it looks very good. very tight . no water possibly can get in it. it has a screen protecter. make sure to remove the sheet of plastic inside and outside of the case before you lock your iPad in it. overall it is price perfect and looks good. much much better than the otter box I got for my other iPad. I paid 44 dollars for that junk. sad thing is that otter box fell apart 1 year after and I couldn't take it back.
customer_reviews.author: fma

customer_reviews.title: A great case to protect my Ipad Air
customer_reviews.text: I have a 5 yr. old Ipad Air which I use and travel with. I recently noticed that the front glass has a few minor cracks around the edge. I ordered this case and it is working great! I feel that the cracks will not get any bigger and it was very easy to install. I did watch the video and recommend it highly. I did cheat a bit on the last side pieces to get on with a tiny screwdriver to help me. I wish it had a way to prop itself up, but light weight and support are the worth the minor inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: soupmom

customer_reviews.title: Difficult Installation. Dissapointing Durability.
customer_reviews.text: Case is a very tight fit. Installation difficulty is High to Very High. Charging port cover was a pain in the butt to hold open while trying to insert the lightning charger; so I cut that part off which made charging much easier. Now after perhaps 3 or 4 weeks of use, possibly one or two drops? the front cover is cracked. I had heard good reviews of Beetle cases and was hoping for something which lasted at least 6 months. Dissapionting durability; Griffin cases seem to last longer... The iPad inside seems Okay.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought this iPad Air protector
customer_reviews.text: Great case! Just purchased and received this case in pink and grey for my granddaughter's new iPad Air we got her. She is 6 and had a iPad 2 but broke the screen by dropping it. It could not be repaired and I was dumb to not get the extra insurance. So this time not only do we have insurance, but it bought this case. It was very tight to get it on, but once on it fits perfect! And every hole for camera, charging and volume control works great! I'm very happy with my purchase. The others must not have the iPad in right, as my camera lines up perfect! I will attach some pictures.
customer_reviews.author: J. Acquilano

customer_reviews.title: Great case, beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: Was a little tough to separate initially out of the box. I got strong hands was scared I was going to break it. Once I got it open my iPad fit fine, felt like it could take some drops with no issues! Btw there is a screen cover on the inside of the screen as well as the outside that you need to remove. I was like where are all these bubbles coming from?? Then my wife tells me did you check to see if there was something on the backside of the screen? Of course once I take it apart again and flip the screen over there is some plastic wrap I had to peel off!
customer_reviews.author: Phooey

customer_reviews.title: Case is perfect for the iPad Air
customer_reviews.text: Great case for iPad Air (version 1). No bubbling on protective screen. Bought this case for my young daughter as the iPad was given as a gift and we wanted it protected. After years of use, it has protected it from minor drops and 1 decent scrape on the screen. The scrape on the protective screen just happened recently and had the protective screen not been there, it was obvious that it would of caused a noticeable scratch on the iPad screen. IPad Air fits perfectly in this case, it was easy to install, and really protects well IMO. We haven't had to test the protection against water, so can't comment on that. Would buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: UKwildcats

customer_reviews.title: Good quality IPAD Air case very similar to Otterbox.
customer_reviews.text: At first the fit seemed a little tight as the screen was being slightly pressed upon by the see through membrane. After a few days it must have loosened up and now fits perfect. I am confident that I could drop this case in any position from a standing height and it would not damage my IPAD Air. Touch screen works well behind protective cover. You can access all the ports/jacks with easy to flip open covers. Good speaker holes. It's a quality case at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Zon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Durable product for the IPad
customer_reviews.text: The was a great investment for protecting my iPad for damage. I use my iPad at work in a outdoor environments. I have dropped my iPad countless times and the case has protected every time over the last two years. One time using the flashlight App I dropped the iPad screen side down onto a water valve. I feared to flip it over because I was sure the screen was cracked, however I was amazed that all that happened was the screen protector had tear in it and the iPad was not damaged. I recommend this product to anybody who works in the field .
customer_reviews.author: AnnP

customer_reviews.title: Holes don’t match up to iPad
customer_reviews.text: This is the FIRST review I’ve ever bothered to write..came across the product again in my list & decided to tell buyers to beware of what they are getting..at least what I got..the holes DONOT match up to where the volume buttons are! Needless to say MOST ANNOYING so I had to stop using this “ supposedly “ called OtterBox before I threw my iPad against the wall ( not that I would really do that but you get my drift )!!️😡 So, if I were you I wouldn’t take the chance..I couldn’t send it back because stupidly I threw out the packaging. How about my money back or send me another one!?️
customer_reviews.author: Robert Roerden

customer_reviews.title: Good fit; screen bubbly
customer_reviews.text: The fit is terrific; the protection looks like it'll do a great job. I was expecting a snap-on screen similar to some of the other ballistic cases. Not that I don't think the film screen will protect the screen; it's hard to install with the rest of the case without bubbles, and the edges fit so snugly, the bubbles are hard (ok, impossible so far) to squeegee out.
customer_reviews.author: Eric O.

customer_reviews.title: Great case. Fit my I-pad Air exactly like the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great case. Fit my I-pad Air exactly like the video showed, but still was a little tricky sliding it in. The screen protector is the best part. It is fantastic, and I can't see anyway dirt would find its way in. The Otterbox on my phone is put to shame by it. Wish it had a kickstand, but the company added that feature for the cases on newer ipad models. Can't fault them for improving the design on later versions. The only downsize is this makes your Ipad Air rather heavy. I mean it weighs pounds.
customer_reviews.author: N. Carothers

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Install is very easy if you watch the video. If you can’t watch the video - simply pull back on the rubber piece where the home button would be, separate the rubber edging from the hard plastic bezel, slide your iPad into the screen protector piece (face down to the clear screen protector, from the bottom and push to the top) and then pop the two pieces back together. It took me about a minute. Great fit, very snug, perfect for my daughter’s iPad.
customer_reviews.author: OfficialC

customer_reviews.title: Good protection
customer_reviews.text: Fits very snug and difficult to put on but once on it is great. I have one on the samsung token but you'll notice right away their weight but protection comes at a cost. One negative, the On/Off button on the top edge is difficult to press now and you need to use the tip of your nail to press it firmly.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, good price. Just watch the installation video first.
customer_reviews.text: This case worked perfectly for my daughter's new iPad. Yes, it can be a challenge to put on the device, but if you watch the video (link provided in instructions), it's pretty straightforward. Personally, I'd rather installation be slightly difficult if it means that thing is NOT coming off easily in the hands of an 11-year-old. She loves the color, the fit is perfect, and I have full confidence that this case will protect her device for years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would even go so far as to recommend this over otterbox or lifeproof cases. Less than half the cost, equal protection
customer_reviews.text: I am thoroughly impressed by this $23 case. I would even go so far as to recommend this over otterbox or lifeproof cases. Less than half the cost, equal protection, it feels super solid in the hand. It does double the weight of the device, but it's to be expected given the level of protection. The rubber and hard plastic snap into place practically seamlessly. The built in scree protector has matrix dots like some of the stick-on ones (this one literally snaps into place, with zero room for error) and the matrix dots make the screen as sensitive as if it were totally naked. Love it, 10/10, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: R Norton

customer_reviews.title: Does everything well except protect the iPad!!
customer_reviews.text: It has a good low profile design, but the supposedly durable case broke when the iPad landed on its corner, and before I could replace the case, the iPad was dropped again (life with young kids - hence the case!). So, my screen is shattered, inside an already broken case. If you need real iPad protection that is actually durable - look elsewhere. That's what I'll be doing when I go to purchase a new screen.
customer_reviews.author: D. Bennion

customer_reviews.title: Get an Otter Box instead
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize one would need a degree in Engineering just to get the thing on and off. It has a VERY tight fit around the outside of the inner case, and makes it very challenging to get on. Eventually I got it on with the help of a knife to peel up one of the edges. Also it seems to trap moisture under the plastic. Basically this is a cheep Otter Box - Next time I will spend more for the Otter Box
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for 5th Gen iPad
customer_reviews.text: This case is good, if it fits your device. We got this for a 5th gen iPad and the case bracket sits on the up volume control button. I ended up breaking it off in order to just get the case on and while we can adjust the volume now it's a total pain. Added 8/22/17: I received an email from the company asking to contact them with issues before placing review. I sent them my iPad model number and pictures of the case. They then said I needed to go through Amazon, when I asked them if they had a case for the iPad 5th gen they gave me a link to another case- not this one.
customer_reviews.author: Velasco

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed this time!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several of these cases and they have been great in the past. The plastic screen cover on this new one isn’t a flat fit and you have to make sure you press hard on the cover, so that the cover will press down enough to make contact with iPad screen. Probably going to end up removing and trashing it.
customer_reviews.author: tfail

customer_reviews.title: This case has kept my young kids iPads safe for over 4 years.
customer_reviews.text: I just bought a replacement because my daughter put a huge deep scratch down the center of her iPad case by dropping it through the couch across a metal rail. I was very relieved that the iPad was like new after we removed it from the protective case. They've kept 2 iPads safe for our young kids for about 4 years. So, I'd definitely recommend getting one.
customer_reviews.author: Full Name

customer_reviews.title: Just get this - you need it
customer_reviews.text: Just ordered my second one of these. The first one is stil in service after 2 years but has several cracks, scrapes, and gouges. The iPad inside is in pristine condition, and isn't that the point? Besides several drops indoors and out, the case has had pancake batter and salad dressing spilled on it and protected the iPad. This case is the cheapest insurance policy you will ever buy.
customer_reviews.author: Dryflyguy

customer_reviews.title: Great case!
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty sturdy case, well built and protects well. It fits really snuggly, and it's tough to take off, which is good because the little guy likes to take things apart. It's also not so darn bulky like some other high protection cases. The screen protector is pretty easy to smudge, but I'm not too worried about that; if it gets scratched, I'm going to just pop it out and put a glass screen protector in its place. We didn't really buy it for the screen protector, but rather the case. If we find something we don't like about it, I'll come back and edit my review, but 5 stars from the first impression!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Strong and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: With three kids, it's hard to keep anything in one piece, especially electronics. That's why we need to invest in tough cases. With this case, we got what we were looking for. Our ipad has been accidently dropped multiple times, and still remains damage free. The case is fairly easy to put on, and when fully in place, you are still able to use the iPad seamlessly. There isn't a whole lot else to say about this other than it does everything we expect of it, and it's relatively inexpensive. I highly recommend this case!
customer_reviews.author: J.B.

customer_reviews.title: Tough as nails
customer_reviews.text: Second case the first one went through hell and back, and zero damage to the iPad, best case out there for abuse, my kid dropped this case more times than I can count, how is iPad is still working I don’t know, but this case can take a beating, the only reason we replaced the old one after two years the home button ripped off on his most recent drop, all in all you will not get a better case for this price point if at any price point with this protection
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really Outstanding Case
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought three different iPad cases now. This is the best. I can’t help but feel a case at all in part defeats if not puts a damper on buying a thin and lightweight iPad, but after replacing two screens in previously “unprotected” pads, I appreciate the real need to have one. Again, this is the best I’ve owned. I’ve bought others that feel like they unnecessarily increase the size and weight of the iPad. This one is sleek and solid, about the best you can get while retaining good protection from the “everyday,” especially kids!
customer_reviews.author: Regular Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great case for ipad air, be gentle installing it.
customer_reviews.text: Great case, seems well made, and has a built in screen protector so you save $$ on that. I read some reviews about its difficult to get the ipad in the case (i have a ipad air gen 1) and it was a little tricky but nothing crazy. Good because its a snug fit, but i can see if you pushed down hard trying to get it in, someone could break the case or their ipad. All the buttons and the screen sensitivity are prefect. Good buy, but take you time installing your ipad.
customer_reviews.author: FL-Health-Nut

customer_reviews.title: Great Product! Great Protection!
customer_reviews.text: While I was talking to a friend about buying a case for my iPad Air, she mentioned this case to me. She told me that she loved the protection that the case provided and that I should look into buying the product. I decided to purchase the black SUPCASE and I love it already. When I opened the packaging, I saw the case and a plastic cover with a bar-code that you could scan for the directions to put the case on. I love that the case is not too bulky and provides a great amount of protection. This is an overall great product.
customer_reviews.author: Teneria

customer_reviews.title: Great protection without bulk
customer_reviews.text: Great case for the price. I have four iPads for the kids and have Beetle cases for all of them. They do not add a lot of bulk, but still provide a ton of protection. My 2-year old hasn’t hurt her iPad that has a beetle case. The other nice thing is it has a built in screen protector to keep scratches from getting on the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Supcase Beetle Defense Case provides very good protection for my devices
customer_reviews.text: Supcase Beetle Defense Case provides very good protection for my devices. This is my 3rd Supcase Beetle case for different devices. Nice fit and feel while using the case, all holes line up correctly. In the future would like to see a slip cover, to protect the screen side, for traveling or storing the device. My kids always seem to scratch the screen protector when not in use. Better this, then the original screen. Finally, case is reasonably priced for the protection it offers.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff M

customer_reviews.title: Didn't help protect my iPad
customer_reviews.text: Looked really nice, it fit well but two days later my new iPad fell off couch and the screen completely shattered. I've got two other iPads that my kids use that are constantly dropped and fall from couches or tables that are in different cases and they only have slight cracks on screen. I think this case somehow distributed the force of the fall throughout the screen causing it too shatter much worse than it would have sans case.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this SUPCASE to replace an Otterbox case that just plain wore out in a year and a half not from being abused or dropped or anything like that. So far I am very happy with this new case fits my iPad perfectly, nice and tight less bulky and light weight. Bonus the outer case/stand from the Otterbox fits this case perfectly. The only thing I didn't like was the screen protector so I removed it with an exacto knife.
customer_reviews.author: CLEastin

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive protective case!
customer_reviews.text: Favorite case for a clumsy college student. I have dropped my ipad so many times it isnt even funny, but this case has protected it from each one of them. I thought it was not going to be quite as good as the otterbox, but it truly is and for a quarter of the price. The screen protector is also amazing, you do not even notice that it is there. Highly recommended for clumsy adults or any parent who would like to save some money on screen repairs!
customer_reviews.author: IA

customer_reviews.title: believe in the beetle
customer_reviews.text: great case, really holds up to a beating and protects the ipad. I bought this for a daycare and believe me they abuse the heck out of this thing. they drop it, spill on it and kick it and the case really does it's job. There is a rainbox of colors to choose from but they don't effect the performance so pick whatever color you like, they all work. Now they do bulk up the ipad significantly, but hey if it protects this investment it's worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Chris M. Wollesen

customer_reviews.title: Great iPad Air Case
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this case to replace another of the same model that we purchased years ago. There was nothing wrong with the old case, but the kids had painted it and the screen cover when they were younger so now they wanted a clean new case. :-)
customer_reviews.author: fiveoh

customer_reviews.title: Protects my IPad Air Very Well with One Caution
customer_reviews.text: I dropped my unprotected iPad Air and destroyed its glass. Upon the recommendation of the guy who repaired my screen, I bought this case. I must say, it is a great value for the money. It's shell is a harder plastic with rubber bumpers and it has a plastic screen protector. Feels like it should have cost a whole lot more! My only gripe is that the capacitive screen has lost some of its responsiveness especially while playing games. It is totally fine for general use and I would still highly recommend anyone with an iPad Air to consider this for its protection.
customer_reviews.author: MikeyC

customer_reviews.title: Life saver. Have not had to replace screen since this case
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Beetle Defense case. I have two toddlers and they are not always careful with the iPads. I had to replace the iPad screen 2 times before I finally purchased this case. I have to admit, since this case, the screen has not cracked even once. Very happy about the quality and protection this offers. Definitely recommended if the intent is to protect the iPad. Only downside is that there is no stand (I knew that before purchasing it). Adding a kick-stand to this case would make it the best choice.
customer_reviews.author: Kakashi

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this case almost two years ago. I wanted a case that would protect my iPad from the constant dropping onto a hardwood floor. Today was the true test of durability. My husband put it on top of the car as we were getting in to leave. We were half way up the street when I saw something out of the corner of my eye. Yes, it was my iPad. I nearly cried as we backed up to retrieve it from the middle of the street. To my surprise and immense relief, it was completely in tact, with one tiny scratch on the corner of one edge. Wow! I am so impressed! Five stars for sure⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️!
customer_reviews.author: Marita

customer_reviews.title: iPad Air Supcase
customer_reviews.text: I did everything humanely possible to get this to fit my iPad, and yes I have an iPad Air not iPad Air 2. I tried for 2 hours, my Husband, who normally has no trouble with things like this, finally gave up and said, it just doesn't fit. Our Son, who's pretty savvy with these cases tried for over an hour and just said, forget it Mom. I garbaged the thing. I saw it and immediately thought, this is what I've been looking for, but it wasn't. I have used the Otter Box always before, but didn't like how heavy it was. This certainly looked good, just didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: slowalker0

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice and product
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure about buying the case but read the reviews and decided to order it. Boy was I shocked the case is fantastic, Heavy duty, looks great on my iPad Air. It's a tight fit had slight issue putting it on But managed without difficulty. The company does put a web site to UTube in package which shows you exactly how to install case or remove case, only problem with that was guy showing me was fast with procedure instead of taking his time. The case came much faster than listed without any issues. Great investment much happier with this case than even my Lifeproof case for my iPhone and a lot cheaper. Would definitely order from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Donna L. Haney

customer_reviews.title: Excellent protection, although a little heavier than some others
customer_reviews.text: Excellent protection, although a little heavier than some others. Very easy to install and cutouts perfectly placed. Protective film was OK but wanted something more robust so removed it and used a different (Anker) tempered glass screen protector instead (SUPCASE still fit perfectly even though new screen protector was heavier). No stand on back, but I use it with an Anker multi-angle aluminum stand that I've had and it all works together perfectly. Overall, very very satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: R. Bigelow

customer_reviews.title: Case fits like a glove...but.
customer_reviews.text: The case fits like a glove, looks like factory, and protects well. There is one thing though, the screen protector scratches easily, very easily, it just takes normal use and your finger nail will do it. I will order a true screen protector take it apart remove the screen from protector off of case than reinstall after I install real screen protector.. The case is really good. If you're going to purchase this case order a true screen protector too.
customer_reviews.author: John Stefanini

customer_reviews.title: Good solid protection
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy case for iPad Air with hard screen cover. It doesn’t have a handle or a stand, but those items are widely available separately. The case is rigid and sturdy with access to all the buttons and controls on the iPad. Great protection.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great case at an even better price.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to offer about the same protection as an Otterbox, but costs half as much and is less bulky. The built in screen protector doesn't seem to affect touch sensitivity, but it does produce more glare and an "oil slick" effect from hand oils. All of this is really only an issue under the right overhead lighting conditions. Buttons work fine, but seems to have a diminished "click" when compared to an Otterbox. All other functions seem to work as the original bare iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Rene N.

customer_reviews.title: Great Case at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this case. Looked at 100 different cases and wanted something that was otter-box like but wasn't $100. This case fits my IPad Air perfectly and the case is of very high quality. All the rubber buttons fit perfectly and line up with all the buttons as they should. Case is constructed very well. Snaps lock together very cleanly and seem to be of good quality. the case feels good in your hands and the screen protector is attached to the case very snugly without any remnants of glue like on some of the cheaper made cases.
customer_reviews.author: Ray H,

customer_reviews.title: Great protection, but HEAVY
customer_reviews.text: Great case. Fits very snuggly, but is a little difficult to put on. screen cover still allows stylus use. pro's: very protective and sturdy, screen cover doesn't affect touch sensitivity, and still allows stylus use. Great if you live at the beach like I do. Sand is kept off of device, but you can still take it to the beach con's: HEAVY, you will not enjoy the lightweight of the iPad air anymore. Difficult to put on, but worth the work. Would definitely recommend as long as weight isn't an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Schulze

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: very durable case but it very hard to press on power button and volume buttons. hopefully, company will consider make it little softer for buttons.
customer_reviews.author: rahat

customer_reviews.title: Rough & Tough!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! And worth its cost! I'm in the military, combat arms. And I walk a lot with my stuff on my back. I was worried with the harsh treatment, my equipment takes a toll. So, going out for a month on this past field problem, this item delievered! It protected my iPad amazingly! Granted, it's not waterproof, but with a plastic bag, I made due; also, it would be great if the screen was non-reflective. I'll be looking at more of their items to see what they have to offer! Again, thanks!
customer_reviews.author: sgt_ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Best one we’ve used, tough, fits tight, kids proof
customer_reviews.text: Fits like a glove and also thin, easier to hold by my kids but still tough -plenty of drops already, still good. Well enclosed to protect from dirt and also dirty kids.
customer_reviews.author: E. West

customer_reviews.title: I would not order or recommend this product until they can assure they fix it
customer_reviews.text: The details indicate precise cutouts for the iPad 5th generation. The cutout for the volume rocker button is incorrect all together. The case has a clip that protrudes the volumn up rocker. We found you can clip the one side of the plastic clip and it no longer covers the volumn up. You can still use the case, but you have to be willing to work around the volumn cutout issue. I would not order or recommend this product until they can assure they fix it. It's really kind of a pain as a work around.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Misaligned volume position
customer_reviews.text: I loved the durability of the item however ended up having to return the product. I have a iPad 5th generation which it clearly stated it would fit. It did fit...unfortunately there was a very hard piece of plastic that clipped over the volume up button on the R side and kept it held down. Once it was fully on, I was only able to only turn the volume down from the side. The up volume button was not accessible.
customer_reviews.author: PetiteRN

customer_reviews.title: Good case, Poor screen protector
customer_reviews.text: The case itself is ok. It does take a great deal of force to get it on and lined up with the buttons on the iPad (volume butons, camera lens, etc.). The screen protector has a lot of air under it as well as ridges, lumps, and bumps. To me, the screen protector is one step up from Saran Wrap. If a good screen protector is important to you, I would recommend buying a separate screen protector and installing it with this case.
customer_reviews.author: MAGS7964Top Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: I don't think you can beat this case for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome for the price. It fits like a glove and the screen protector is awesome (in my opinion). I really can't say enough good things about it. It's exactly what I was looking for. It's slim, easy to hold, and very protective. It's a little tricky to get installed, but nothing major. I really like how this case looks, fits, and how all the ports and buttons are protected. Now I through my iPad in the back pack without any worries. this case is cheap enough to be worth a try. I don't think you'll regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Cubicle Warrior

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend. This is my second Supcase for my iPad. It protected my iPad when I dropped it from waist high a couple years ago. I wish they sold just the screen protector part of the case, that's all I needed. But the price is very reasonable on Amazon that buying a second case after 2 years was not a problem for me. If my husband ever upgrades to an iPhone (he still old fashioned with a flip phone mainly due to the ruggedness), I'll definitely get him a Supcase to protect it.
customer_reviews.author: sheri81428

customer_reviews.title: same case for over 4 years!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this case for over 4 years on the same tablet, has been dropped many times, and held up with 2 kids using it, buying another one just to change up the color!
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fit my iPad Air and I'm pissed, but seems to good case if it fits
customer_reviews.text: This case seems sturdy and looks ok. The two stars are to knock the product. They are due to the fact that this DIDN'T fit my iPad Air. I have the original, the very first iPad Air. Did I miss something in the description? I really thought it would fit. Anyway, now I want to return it but somehow I have to pay for return shipping ugh. I use prime so I rarely ever pay for shipping both ways. I received the product via Prime, but I wish I had known of the return shipping costs. I'm basically holding an item I can't even use!! Seems like a good product otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Great for a Year!
customer_reviews.text: I love this case! I had a little difficulty putting it on my IPad and was worried that because it was tight it would scuff or cause a mark, but it didn't! The case stayed in tack for about a year but after that it started to crack in the corners and the front part of the case starting fall off into piece. To be honest I am not the most gentle with my iPad and this partially could have been my fault. But I decided to purchase another one, since it did do a good job at protecting my IPad for a year which I think is a good shelf life!
customer_reviews.author: TheGetch

customer_reviews.title: Kept our iPads safe!
customer_reviews.text: We bought 4 of these for work iPads Airs. They keep the iPads nice and safe - I have accidentally dropped one onto a carpeted concrete floor with no issue. Also is nice because you can stack the iPads easily without worrying about scratching the screens. I took off one star because the ports can be difficult to access, and the power button is definitely not as easy to push with the case on. Home button works ok. Pushing on icons near the edges of the screen requires more force than at the center of the screen, due to the way the screen protector is attached.
customer_reviews.author: Cory D. Hamma

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!!! Excellent case!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely one of the best cases out there! We switched from am otterbox because my kids were tearing apart the sides! I didn't want to spend that much on another case they could destroy so I looked around and found this. I did have to watch the video for how to install my ipad, but once I did that it was a piece of cake. Our ipad has had some pretty bad falls since we put this case on and it is still in excellent condition! I was very surprised with how well this case protected it. I loved it so much I ordered another one for my daughter's ipad. I would recommend this case to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: R Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: This protection case is great!!!
customer_reviews.text: This case is built like a tank! I've had this product covering my iPad Air since December 2013 and while I don't make a habit of dropping my iPad Air sometimes that happens and the case takes the hit. The iPad still looks brand new. I must admit I've never dropped it on concrete or other hard surfaces from any higher than sitting in a chair but the iPad keeps working. My only gripe is the clear cover over the screen is a glare monster by it self. I fixed that with an anti-glare film that works well. Yes the clear cover and the film mute the screen somewhat but not enough to be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: TWS

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised by the build quality
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised with the build quality of the Supcase. I purchased on for my iPad Air and while I was not a big fan of the built in screen protector (which is adhered with double stick tape so it can be permanently removed with a pocket knife) the case is solid. It is significantly slimmer than the OtterBox or LifeProof offerings and is a two piece design which is sturdy and sleek. I want to get my wife one for her iPad 3 now. Pros: slim, does not add much weight sturdy two piece design very durable Cons: screen protector is annoying, but can be removed with a pocket knife no kickstand
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Darden

customer_reviews.title: Very snug and tight fitting. A+
customer_reviews.text: The case fits perfectly on the IPad Air. It snaps onto the IPad and is very snug, then the rubber runs tightly around the blue plastic for an almost water tight fit. It would be difficult for my seven year old to take it apart. I am very confident that this case will protect my son's IPad from his unwavering daily abuse. He love the look of it also, which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Dumpling

customer_reviews.title: Love it. I am super abusive to my electronics ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I am super abusive to my electronics and this has been a life saver. Fits perfectly. Don't listen to the people complaining about being too tight. Yes, the plastic on the screen is kinda bubbly and doesn't always sit against the glass but that has never bothered me. Only gripe is that the bottom speaker output severely limit the volume making it to your ears/forward viewer. This may be the case with all these type of.. um.. cases. But I wouldn't know as this is my first iPad. I ended up making a duct tape noise director to help with some volume.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J.

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to use buttons . Case is stiff. iPad is always on since this case was applied. We have reapplied twice. I had hoped to save money over more expensive cases, but we ended up buying one anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Jill E. Griffin

customer_reviews.title: I liked it, but
customer_reviews.text: I liked it, but..... Don't get me wrong, this product does what it was intended to do. It makes your device feel heavy, which I do not mind, but the problem occurs during the installation process. If you are not careful (like my problem), snapping the corners onto your iPad will most likely create a hairline crack to spread throughout the screen at the corners. If I were to purchase this item again, I would most likely be careful, because on an iPad, I cannot stand to see cracks on my screen.
customer_reviews.author: SHELDON WILLIAMS

customer_reviews.title: Buttons don't line up with IPad 5, Protective hard case, had to cut some parts so volume button worked
customer_reviews.text: Protective but very hard to push Power button. Volume button does not line up with iPad 5 so impossible to use without modification cutting the stiff plastic so there is any access to volume control. Cover fits tight, screen cover does not impair at all.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Awesome SUPCASE.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Product. However, I had to search on YouTube on how to specifically install the IPAD Air Version because the one of the instructions did not really help. It just takes (Patience) time and effort to install it, but it is really well worth it if you want something that will really protect it if it falls. My IPad Air cracked before I purchased it. Wish I had purchased it earlier so I did not have to worry about fixing the screen in the future! Good Product!
customer_reviews.author: Rayslight

customer_reviews.title: Great rugged case, w/ just a couple flaws.
customer_reviews.text: This case is awesome! I'm giving it 4/5 stars for 2 reasons though. One, there's no way for you to stand the iPad up so if you're working at a desk it's going to be frustrating having to hold it all the time. Second, it's a huge pain to get on and off. I don't mind this one as much because once it's on you can tell it's never coming off or loosening up. It's a very rugged and durable case that will absolutely protect your iPad for falls. Just wish they would add some kind of kick stand in the back to prop it up and it would be perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Gilly135

customer_reviews.title: Im in love....
customer_reviews.text: I was unsure about this product at first. However, once i unboxed it and applied it to my ipad, i was shocked to see it was a PERFECT FIT. Past cases would leave room around the ipad, which causes the ipad to press buttons without assistance. I LOVE the built in screen protector as well, the visual is superb, not glossy at all. I WILL purchase from this maker and seller again!

customer_reviews.title: this is a super heavy duty case
customer_reviews.text: this is a super heavy duty case. good price for the product too. pretty much makes your ipad into a tank. a down side would be it is heavy even my 4 yr old struggles to hold it in one hand. on the side note, i don't worry about her ever dropping and cracking the ipad. the case is well made and durable for kid abuse.
customer_reviews.author: me man

customer_reviews.title: Solid case but the screen protector could be improved
customer_reviews.text: Installed this today. Very well built and my iPad feels indestructible. Such an easy install and it comes with a link to watch the YouTube install video, which I did. The only negative is that the plastic on the cover is flimsy - it is NOT a hard clear plastic like I thought I was getting. It is just a plastic sheet fled to the inside of the case. So far this has led to weird glares sometimes but honestly at this price point I'm happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Jess E.

customer_reviews.title: Holy hard to put on and holds the volume button down!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is adult proof! The quality seems ok, but it sooo hard to get on and off!! It also hold down the volume down button allll the time so if you want to turn up your volume you have to take it off!! It says it’s for iPad Air, buuuut idk.....
customer_reviews.author: Chasatie Hall

customer_reviews.title: Tedious assembly and horrendous durability.
customer_reviews.text: I've given these cases multiple tries but they never make it much beyond a year without cracking along the edges. They seem sturdy enough at first but simply don't last even with pampered use. Additionally, getting this case on or off is quite a bit more tedious than it should be - I believe it's a bit too snug of a fit which causes the assembly and the stress fractures over time. Caveat emptor!
customer_reviews.author: Conjugal Visit

customer_reviews.title: Tough case
customer_reviews.text: I always buy from this brand because of how tough their cases are. Covers your whole iPad or phone and I like that it covers the ports so no dust will get in. Screen portion is tough as well
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy J.

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought this!
customer_reviews.text: Hubby had no trouble putting the case on my iPad. So far, so good! I'm not willing to drop my iPad intentionally to test the case, but I feel better about having my iPad with me wherever I go because of the protection provided by the case. One piece of advice: make sure you use a surface that is perfectly clean as your work space when installing the case because the screen cover will find every little crumb on the breakfast table and magically take them with it when you place the cover on your iPad screen, creating little bumps in the surface!
customer_reviews.author: P. Locascio

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it; you'll be glad.
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these; one for the Ipad Air and another (pink) for the Ipad mini. Both are exceptional products that are superior (far superior) to their competitor (Otterbox). My tablet didn't have an option through the Beetle Defense line, so I paid $5 more for an Otterbox and wow was I disappointed (comparing my tablet to my wife's, with this case on it). This case gives a grip from any angle, is lighter than the competitor, and just looks amazing in person. We even bought a matching version for her iphone.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Not for iPad Air 3 either!
customer_reviews.text: The description only says not compatible with iPad Air 2. It doesn’t say anything about the 3. Well, it doesn’t fit the 3 either! Please update the description seller! Very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Matt S.

customer_reviews.title: Best Ipad Air Cover at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I did an extensive search to find the best cover and I have! This fits our ipad air perfectly. It is very secure, but is removable, too. I will send my 10 yr old to school with this without any worries of damage to the ipad. The built in screen protector is easy to see through. We just ordered another one as a back up, because we love this one so much, that I don't want to take a change they will be sold out later. Great price, too!
customer_reviews.author: The Weez

customer_reviews.title: Shattered completely :(
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could love this, but it’s quite the opposite. We have cases from life proof and those bigger names but decided to give this a try. I’m sad to report, it didn’t withstand my 3 year old simply dropping it 3 feet under him. Now I’m out an iPad, as it completely shattered. Be careful if you have kids that will be using this case. I’d suggest investing in a well known case.
customer_reviews.author: Review4Amazon1

customer_reviews.title: It works ok, front side requires improvement.
customer_reviews.text: This iPad Air Case was a gift to my co-worker and he is sort of Okay with this, It is pretty tough to put this on iPad Air, and the screen protector somehow reduces the retina screen effect. I gets sort of rainbow looks. Back side protect is superior and the controls are easily reached. It does its job from the backside. But feels in-adequate from front side. So the rating reflects it. Better stick with known brands covers for expensive apple products.
customer_reviews.author: ChrmVI

customer_reviews.title: Okay But Has Issues
customer_reviews.text: This case will do it's job as far as keeping my iPad safe. But I have a few issues with it. First off, it is very hard to get on. It is very tight fitting. I had to use a flat head screw driver to pop it all of the way on. And I'm also upset because the charging plug is so far deep in the case that it will not plug into my iHome docking station. If I had known that it wouldn't fit, I probably wouldn't have bought this case.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Angela Young

customer_reviews.title: Still going strong after 2 years.
customer_reviews.text: Still using it a couple years later! The corners have little hairline cracks in them now, but nothing that is going to require a new case any time soon. I have a 3 year old son and a 9 year old...and the fact that my iPad is still in tact says quite a bit about this case I believe.
customer_reviews.author: Robin MS

customer_reviews.title: Great and sturdy !
customer_reviews.text: This is sturdy and durable so much that the bottoms are super hard to pick down so they can work. That is my only complaint. But other then that it’s great. I did wish it had a kick stand.
customer_reviews.author: Tabbatha Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Great first impression
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our 4 year old. He's gentle with the handling of his iPad, but that doesn't mean that an accident can't happen. I couldn't be happier with the decision. The fit is snug as I had difficulties snapping the front plate on. Don't get me wrong it took some coaxing but once on, everything fell into place. This is definitely a rugged case. The volume buttons, power button, and home button all have a nice feel and great feedback. I'm tempted to buy one of these for my Nexus 6p. Great first experience with Supcase.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: The case is good quality, definitely sturdy which is what I was looking for for my sons iPad. The only tiny con is the screen cover is a very thing sheet of plastic that doesn’t lay completely flat so there are some bubbles that show rainbow coloring at certain angles. It does come with a screen protector that adheres to the screen and that one is fine. Just the top protector is the problem. Other than that I’m happy with the case.
customer_reviews.author: Rebeccah Olivares

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I would've given 1 star of not for the fact that the case itself seems pretty durable and well made and it was easy to install. However, the screen protector sucks, it sits above the iPad screen with space in between making the device VERY difficult to use. There are parts Of the screen that are completely unresponsive to touch, very frustrating. The most important part of the iPad is basically unprotected, everyone knows how delicate ipads can be especially the screen, ita hard to believe they dropped the ball so hard.
customer_reviews.author: K. whitmore

customer_reviews.title: SUPERCASE- Lives up to it's name!
customer_reviews.text: This is one heavy duty case that will protect your iPad very well. The fit and looks, like the defender series water proof cases. It almost looks water proof, but I wouldn't put it under water, there is are some exposed places the water could get in-speaker and mic holes, fits very well! It may be a little tricky getting on, I wouldn't want it if I switched cases everyday or often, but once it's on you will know why it fits so well and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: G. Michini

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product and Value - Be sure to Review Post by JJCEO
customer_reviews.text: The review by JJCEO is perfect. JJCEO responded to my question concerning the need for a additional underlying screen protector. I went with his recommendation and did not purchase one. The video by JJCEO is excellent! I followed it, the case installed without any problems and I am very happy with the SUPCASE. It is an excellent value ($22.99), much less expensive and of better quality than ones I reviewed in stores. One of the main differences is that store products generally have a cover for the viewing screen.
customer_reviews.author: Topspin

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as name brand
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case for my son who is autistic and is always dropping his iPad. It works AWESOME!! The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because the corners of the plastic crack after awhile and it's very difficult to open to clean the iPad screen, sometimes liquid gets between the iPad and screen protector. I'll always buy this case instead of the more expensive name brand ones cuz it works just as well!!
customer_reviews.author: Cheri K. Boyle

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent case. It provides protection on the same level ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent case. It provides protection on the same level of cases that sell for 3 to 4 times as much. It is light weight and very durable. The screen cover is great, though you need to be sure to take the film off of both sides (I missed the inside cover my first try). Color is vibrant, which makes finding the iPad easier. This is for my sons iPad, and is a replacement for one that did not work nearly as well. Since using it he has dropped the iPad several times and there has been no damage as a result of this cover. Strongly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Logue

customer_reviews.title: Durability, Protection & Functionality
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for your expedient and outstanding service! I received my items quicker than I expected. I am pleased with what I ordered. Worth ordering again when that time comes.
customer_reviews.author: Edward F. T. Charfauros

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: This case works great for my iPad Air. It does not add too much bulk to the tablet, but it does add some weight. The screen protector is part of the case. I have had no issues with the plastic protector scratching and the touch feature works great through the protector. I have not dropped the tablet, but my daughter has the mini version of this case and it has held up to drops and kids use.
customer_reviews.author: heidi23

customer_reviews.title: Great protection.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this case for about 8 months. I previously had an Otterbox defender. This case is much better. My soft plastic part of my otterbox didn't last long before it's started to break apart. This case is still fitting like a glove. No problems getting it on. My screen looks great, except for the scratch that was my fault. I do wish this case had a hard shell that you could put over the screen for transport. For the money, this case is really nice.
customer_reviews.author: W. Fitzpatrick

customer_reviews.title: We have several of these cases and prefer them over any other case.
customer_reviews.text: We love these cases, my daughter has dropped her iPad several times and it's never cracked the screen. The case did crack after several years so we just ordered another one.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Hughes

customer_reviews.title: SUP [ER] CASE!!!
customer_reviews.text: SUPCASE for iPad Air, is quite nice! Installation was slightly challenging, but with a little patience, I was able to apply the case in under 10 minutes. Also, the "video link/tutorial" proved quite helpful! The case itself, is lighter than its bulkier predecessor (Otterbox) and so is the price point! The design is very well thought out, as it fits snug and all my iPad buttons and features are accessible and fully operational. The screen protection is quite clear and super responsive, no hazy film or touch sensitivity lag whatsoever. I am impressed and quite pleased with this product and purchase. Buy a SUPCASE, you won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Bikki Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to install, but seems durable.
customer_reviews.text: Installation instructions weren't provided with this, but it was fairly simple to install in theory. In reality, though, installation was a bit of a pain due to the form-fit front panel and the back. Both required a bit of effort to get the corners on, with the rubber backing requiring a flat object to pry it out and over the rim. Installation aside, it does feel fairly durable. Hopefully it'll stand up to my 12 year old, who managed to destroy the glass on his iPad mini while it was in a different case.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit iPad Generation 5 (2017 Release)
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these cases for each of my iPads at home. However, this DOES NOT fit the iPad Generation 5 (2017) even though it stays that it does. I was able to get the case on my iPad but the button holes do not match up. I am disappointed because this case seems very durable and offers great protection.
customer_reviews.author: launiquela

customer_reviews.title: I had pretty low expectations for what I paid for it but ...
customer_reviews.text: I am totally impressed with this case. I had pretty low expectations for what I paid for it but I figured I did not really need the protection of the outter box as this iPad not leaving the house that often but wanted some sort of protection. I ordered the Beatle strictly based on reviews and they were spot on . The case is such a deal I would have given 5 stares if it came with a hard screen cover for travel . If your on a budget this is the best bang for the buck . two thumbs up
customer_reviews.author: Philip Tomaszewski

product_meta.title: iPad Air Case, SUPCASE Heavy Duty Beetle Defense Series Full-Body Rugged Hybrid Protective Case Cover with Built-in Screen Protector for Apple iPad Air (Black/Black, not fit iPad Air 2)
product_meta.description: Color:BlackSUPCASE Beetle Defense Series Hybrid Protective Case provides a stylish but protective shield between your iPad Air and the accidental drop, scrape, or scratch. Made from soft thermoplastic polyurethane and hard polycarbonate materials, SUPCASE Beetle Defense Series Protective Case snaps on for immediate protection. Compatibility: Compatible with iPad Air (1st generation), allowing full access to touchscreen, camera, buttons, and ports. NOT COMPATIBLE with iPad Air 2, iPad 1/2/3/4 and iPad Mini 1st/2nd Generation. Materials: High-grade polycarbonate + thermoplastic polyurethane for shock absorption. Front cover with built-in screen protector prevents scratches without compromising sensitivity. Design: Designed with both protection and looks in mind, SUPCASE Beetle Defense Series Full-body Hybrid Case provides shock absorption and scratch prevention while maintaining a sporty profile. - Advanced Front Cover Design for Easy Installation - Built-in Screen Protector without compromising sensitivity - Advanced dual-layer (PC + TPU) design provides great impact and shock resistance and prevents accidental drop, bumps, and shock - Port Cover keeps out debris and dust - Easy access to all features (buttons, camera, speaker, and ports) - Sporty profile and multiple color options What's in the package? 1x SUPCASE Beetle Defense Case for iPad Air
feature_bullets: Precise cutouts for iPad Air（iPad 5th Generation）; Not Compatible with iPad 1/2/3/4 and iPad Mini 1st and 2nd Gen
Advanced dual layer designed case combined of Polycarbonate hard shell and flexible TPU withstands accidental drop, bumps and shock
Front cover with built-in screen protector prevents scratches without compromising sensitivity
Advanced front cover Snap-On design for EASY installation
All features accessible with case installed; Port covers keep out debris and dust; Sporty design with multi-color options

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars5,221 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
